predicate.note: Frames file for 'ignite' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 45.4.

example.name: active
example.text: This trend appears to be especially true at General Motors Corp., which [*T*-1] used both dealer and consumer incentives [*-3] to ignite sales in August and September.

example.name: passive
example.text: Chancellor of the Exchequer Nigel Lawson views the high rates as his chief weapon against inflation, which [*T*-2] was ignited [*-1] by tax cuts and loose credit policies in 1986 and 1987.
example.arg: tax cuts and loose credit policies
